name: home-assistant-polymer
description: A frontend for Home Assistant using the Polymer framework

scripts.frontend_prod: npm run js_prod && bower install && npm run frontend_html
scripts.frontend_demo: npm run js_demo && bower install && npm run frontend_html
scripts.setup_js_dev: npm install && cd node_modules && rm -rf home-assistant-js && git clone https://github.com/balloob/home-assistant-js.git && cd home-assistant-js && npm install

author: Paulus Schoutsen <Paulus@PaulusSchoutsen.nl> (http://paulusschoutsen.nl)
